text:
options:
 prefix: &e&l[&bMirageRPG&e&l]&a
 : 60 second
 : &6TP
 : &cTP
 : &4&l&b&c&n
 P1-x: 1436
 P1-y: 4
 P1-z: 1053
variables:
   {cooldown%player%} = 0

on right click holding a diamond:
 name of held item is "<aqua><gold>Lv.1"
 open chest with 1 row named "<blue>" to player
 difference between {cooldown%player%} and now is less than {@cooldown} tick:
  send "{@} {@}" to player
 else:
  teleport the player to the location ({@P1-x}, {@P1-y}, {@P1-z})
  send "{@}" to player
  set {cooldown%player%} to now
